note.p: Builder. Of Battersea, Surrey, with business premises at Webber Row, Blackfriars Road, Southwark.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/334/48/44), 1871 (RG10/702/12/18), 1881 (RG11/645/18/19)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 11 March 2016)
